subject: Order tracking
description_text:
Hello, I haven't received any updates on part of my order.

DHL tracking doesn't seem to be working properly.

Thanks by advance.

Order number : #SSN3075

Tracking number : SF6045991008448

conversations.body_text: Hi Lucas lml,    Here is your shipping tracking information. I noticed that the package was delivered on the 4th. Please check if it has arrived.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045991008448
